articles.title: Karim Benzema's presentation at Al Ittihad was amazing - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Ballon d'Or winner Karim Benzema opted to move to Al Ittihad instead of signing a new contract at Real Madrid, and he got quite the welcome in Saudi Arabia.
articles.content:
Ballon d'Or winner Karim Benzema opted to move to Al Ittihad instead of signing a new contract at Real Madrid. Yasser Bakhsh/Getty Images
